York State Register September 27, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 39, eff. 9/27/2017

Statutory Authority: Highway Law subdivision 236(4), Transportation Law subdivision 14(18). State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
